original_text: Now it came to pass, as David sat in his house, that David said to Nathan the prophet, Lo, I dwell in an house of cedars, but the ark of the covenant of the Lord remaineth under curtains.
korean_text: 다윗이 그의 궁전에 거주할 때에 다윗이 선지자 나단에게 이르되 나는 백향목 궁에 거주하거늘 여호와의 언약궤는 휘장 아래에 있도다

sentences.original_text: as David sat in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 그의 집에 앉아 있을 때

sentences.original_text: that David said to Nathan the prophet
Lo, I dwell in an house of cedars
but the ark of the covenant of the Lord
